title: BCM Group acquires five star property The Golden Palms Resorts and Spa
description: BCM Group bought The Golden Palms Resorts and Spa in Bengaluru, aiming to turn it into a prime site for weddings and MICE events. The 15-acre luxury hotel will undergo upgrades, including adding over 50 rooms and partnering with a top international hotel operator, according to managing director Rajesh Mehta.
